panels.description: Tango-operator reconcile count for device server
panels.title: Overall reconcile Count

panels.description: Tango-operator reconcile count for device server
panels.title: Reconcile Count

targets.expr: tempfile_allocate_problem{datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", device_server_name="$DeviceServer"} + tempfile_close_problem{datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", device_server_name="$DeviceServer"} + tempfile_write_problem{datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", device_server_name="$DeviceServer"}

panels.description: Tango-operator reconcile count for device server after success
panels.title: Reconcile Count after success

panels.description: Reschedule for Pending dependency on device name
panels.title: Pending dependencies

targets.expr: sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{job="cadvisor", namespace="$namespace", pod="deviceserver-$DeviceServer-0", container!="", datacentre="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container) /sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{job="cadvisor", namespace="$namespace", pod="deviceserver-$DeviceServer-0", container!="", datacentre="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container)

sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="deviceserver-$DeviceServer-0"}) by (container) / sum(cluster:namespace:pod_cpu:active:kube_pod_container_resource_requests{datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="deviceserver-$DeviceServer-0"}) by (container)

sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="deviceserver-$DeviceServer-0"}) by (container) / sum(cluster:namespace:pod_cpu:active:kube_pod_container_resource_limits{datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="deviceserver-$DeviceServer-0"}) by (container)
sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="cadvisor", datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="", image!=""}) by (container)
sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="cadvisor", datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="", image!=""}) by (container)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="cadvisor", datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", image!=""}) by (container) / sum(cluster:namespace:pod_memory:active:kube_pod_container_resource_requests{datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}) by (container)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="cadvisor", datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="", image!=""}) by (container) / sum(cluster:namespace:pod_memory:active:kube_pod_container_resource_limits{datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}) by (container)
sum(container_memory_rss{job="cadvisor", datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container != "", container != "POD"}) by (container)
sum(container_memory_cache{job="cadvisor", datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container != "", container != "POD"}) by (container)
sum(container_memory_swap{job="cadvisor", datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container != "", container != "POD"}) by (container)

ceil(sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{job="cadvisor", device=~"mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", container!="", datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{job="cadvisor", device=~"mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", container!="", datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{job="cadvisor", device=~"mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", container!="", datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

ceil(sum by(container) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{job="cadvisor", container!="", datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_total{job="cadvisor", container!="", datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(container) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{job="cadvisor", container!="", datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{job="cadvisor", container!="", datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(container) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{job="cadvisor", device=~"mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", container!="", datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(container) (rate(container_fs_writes_total{job="cadvisor",device=~"mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", container!="", datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(container) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{job="cadvisor", device=~"mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", container!="", datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_total{job="cadvisor", device=~"mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", container!="", datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(container) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{job="cadvisor", device=~"mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", container!="", datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(container) (rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{job="cadvisor", device=~"mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", container!="", datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(container) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{job="cadvisor", device=~"mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", container!="", datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{job="cadvisor", device=~"mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", container!="", datacentre="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
